document.title: Technical Bulletins: The 1991 MTAS Salary and Fringe Benefits Survey: Salaries Out-Pace Inflation
document.abstract: From December 1990 to December 1991, salaries of workers in Tennessee's cities and towns out-paced inflation while total numbers of employees declined. That's just one of the findings of the comprehensive salary andÂ·fringe benefits survey conducted annually by The University of Tennessee's Municipal Technical Advisory Service. This summary of the 1991 findings is designed to help towns, cities, and others evaluate and compare the data and prepare budgets based on the most up-to-date information.
